title: Tertha Dev Sarker
Full Stack Developer
Software Engineer
description: I'm a professional Full Stack Developer. I'm very passionate and learning new technology is my passion. Also I'm a quick learner. Technology doesn't matter to me.
about: Myself Tertha Dev Sarker. I'm a professional web developer and I always like to learn new technology because it's very exciting for me. I've completed many projects but I can't face any challenge to complete projects because I think 'If your aim is strong, You can do it easily'. I always take it easy to complete any kind of task. And I always like to that task which is very challenging for others one.
